title: I want to creat a Ranked team :) Dia level
body:
So as i wrote in the Title i want to creat a Ranked Team
training Schedule : when the Team is created then we will see how people have time to Play :) but at least 3-4 times in a Weak and at the weakends we will play Tournaments.
Team Language is ofc English. You dont have to speak English perfectly but we need to understand you.
At the Moment we are searching for Top , Adc and Support
Top - Maybe you ?:)
Jungle - SPG Phänox
Mid - Neÿlan
ADC - Maybe you ?:)
Support Maybe you ?:)
we are taking people from dia4-Challenger
Just add me SPG Phänox :)
Iam sry for my English if there are some mistakes just ignore them :)

replies.body:
you're in the German Forum dude :)

Regards Ashuna {{champion:1}}
